content: treat the youngest member of the family to their very own **easter chick piv** 1 - a really soft and cute little chick piv is crocheted in baby snuggle which makes it extra soft and huggable combine it with the **chick pip** 2 who s a slightly larger version have fun **materials ** crochet hook size 6 mm baby snuggle colors 07 and 37 safety eyes 14 mm or 16 mm fiberfill **measurements ** approx 23 cm tall **yarn usage approx ** pastel yellow 100g yellow 10g **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **m** stitch es **magic_ring** magic_ring **single_crochet** single_crochet **slip_stitch s** slip_stitch es **bl** back loop **decrease** together 1 https //hobbii com/easter-chick-piv utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=easter-chick-piv+hbtrack&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/easter-chick-pip utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=easter-chick-pip+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
